input.sentences: after taking a cab from the airport | the couple arrived at their resort .
they were unnerved at how quiet it was and that the place seemed to be deserted .
they checked neighboring rooms but saw no one .
the couple eventually made it to the kitchen and there was no food or any sign that someone might return .
frustrated and a bit scared | the couple checked their maps and realized that they were at the wrong location . they headed out the abandoned place and traveled through the trees .
output.sentences: Jerry and Linda decided to book their vacation online.
They scrolled through photos of a beautiful resort with a wonderful clubhouse.
When they checked in, it didn't seem quite like the photos they had seen online.
The clubhouse kitchen was especially run down.
Their cabin was overgrown with jungle, but other than the monkeys that stole their watches, they enjoyed being away from it all.
